definition: schizandra (Schisandra chinensis)/Magnolia vine
five/5
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: South Schisandra is singly small, flesh thin, looked withered, seeds there is no gloss rough.
sentences.chinese: 而南五味子粒小肉薄顯乾癟，種子粗糙無光澤。

sentences.english: Objective Setting up HPLC finger-print chromatogram of decoction of Schisandra chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立五味子水煎物的HPLC指紋圖譜。

sentences.english: Schisandra is Chinese traditional medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 五味子屬植物是我國傳統的中藥材。

sentences.english: Objective To study the microwave assisted extraction process of Schisandra chinensis(Turcz)Baill.
sentences.chinese: 目的微波輔助萃取五味子的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Methods Polysaccharide in Schisandra chinensis (Turcz) Baill Fruit was determined by the method of Spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用比色法測定北五味子中多糖含量。

sentences.english: To study the optimal water extraction technology of polysaccharide from ethanol-insoluble residue of Schisandra.
sentences.chinese: 研究工業五味子醇提殘渣中多糖的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Fruit of Chinesemagnoliavine wooden fat element soft capsule developmentimprovementabove many questions.
sentences.chinese: 五味子木脂素軟膠囊的研製改善上述的諸多問題。

sentences.english: The functions of SCP in reducing weight and fat were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了北五味子多糖的降脂減肥作用。

sentences.english: Schisandra chinensis is the genuine medicinal plant in northeast china.
sentences.chinese: 北五味子是東北三省重要的地道藥材。

definition: Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
ladybell root (Radix adenophorae)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
licorice root
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
Salvia miltiorrhiza
goji berry
Manchurian wild ginger (family Asarum)
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
eucommia (a kind of rubber tree)
